bio.review: They may just be getting started, but man what a start!
bio.description:
Born and raised in Denver, Colorado, they started writing as a hobby when they were 5-years-old. It was about then that they started learning the guitar as well. As they grew up, they honed both their writing and musical skills, and eventually thought they would have to choose between their passions, but luckily that never happened.

THey found their way to Juliard and pursued their musical talents educationally, but started writing on the side on a small blog to help pay the bills. By the time they graduated, they had found themselves hired to be a back-up guitarist for a Nashville-based country band, and also contracted by a magazine to write a column. For the past 7 years, they have split their time touring and writing from the road.

In the early 2000s, they finally decided to start sharing their writing passion through books as well. After several years of practice and scribbling, they finally finished their first title. Novel-writing isn't their bread-winner yet, but it is definitely helping them aspire to greater heights and deepen their passion for writing. Their work has even been reviewed by the New York Times!

By the time they graduated, they had found themselves hired to be a back-up guitarist for a Nashville-based country band, and also contracted by a magazine to write a column. For the past 7 years, they have split their time touring and writing from the road.

In the early 2000s, they finally decided to start sharing their writing passion through books as well. After several years of practice and scribbling, they finally finished their first title. Novel-writing isn't their bread-winner yet, but it is definitely helping them aspire to greater heights and deepen their passion for writing. Their work has even been reviewed by the New York Times!
